snippet: The police said it appears that a faculty member of a Wyoming community college was killed during class, that a female victim was killed off campus and that the attacker committed suicide.
lead_paragraph: The police said it appears that a faculty member of a Wyoming community college was killed during class, that a female victim was killed off campus and that the attacker committed suicide.

headline.seo: Attack at Wyoming College Proves Fatal
headline.main: Attack at Wyoming College Proves Fatal
